title: [BUG] Random iOS Crash GRBackendRenderTarget.GetGlFramebufferInfo()
body:
**Description**

Seeing random gr_backendrendertarget_get_gl_framebufferinfo crashes in AppCenter for the iOS versions of our app. Not seeing this problem for Android.

**Code**

Calls into this method are coming in from FFImageLoading (Xamarin.FFImageLoading.Svg.Forms (2.4.11.982)), which we use to render simple SVG images. Here is an example stack trace from AppCenter:
